Service.Name: ReadFileOffFileSystemTest
Service.AuthorRoles: Domain Users,Windows SBS Remote Web Workplace Users,Windows SBS Fax Users,Windows SBS Folder Redirection Accounts,All Users,Windows SBS SharePoint_MembersGroup,Windows SBS Link Users,Company Users,Business Design Studio Developers,Test Engineers,DEV2 Limited Internet Access,
Service.Comment: Test workflow for reading a file on the local file sysytem
